page.title: 12New Tean Mill(cont.)
page.content: It was at this time that the cottage based work ceased, all the processes being centralized.Throughout the nineteenth century, additions to the building were made not only westwards along the High Street but also northwards behind the main building, until by 1885 the building was complete. The Company kept modernising internally although some old looms still existed in the 1950's. New Tean Mill Ltd as it is now known is the largest employer in the area with a work force of about 350.It produces many different items ranging from ribbons to electrical insulating material mostly made from man-made fibre.
